content: I noticed that the resources type SupportingDocumentation should not be included in the hapi-fhir server. But how can I exclude it from the resources if I am using "myResourceProvidersDstu2" to register the resource providers.
@James Agnew ? (By the way @Vzz, you may want to raise future HAPI-related questions on the HAPI stream.)

Hi Vzz,

This has been corrected in the upcoming HAPI FHIR 2.4 release.
Anybody knows which resource in fhir denotes to the medical vitals
and there are profiles for many vital signs - http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-profiles.html
